rules_text:
Distraction [i](This creature can’t be blocked as long as there is an unblocked attacking creature with greater power.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature you control have base power and toughness 5/1 until end of turn.
Whenever Atkos Tarr, Hidden Assassin deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
